column3: Motivation?  Curious whether whatever you're using this for should be using descendant fee rate or ancestor fee rate (see #7594)...\n
@sdaftuar is right this should be using ancestor indexing\n
@pstratem Can you elaborate? How does this guarantee the avoidance of orphans? Transaction descendants can have both higher or lower feerate than the parent.\n

@sipa it doesn't i mis understood what was being indexed.

i'll fix this properly later
